*.documentation.description: Style to use for references in documentation.

*.static.description: Style to use for symbols that are static.

*.abstract.description: Style to use for symbols that are abstract.

*.deprecated.description: Style to use for symbols that are deprecated.

*.modification.description: Style to use for write accesses.

*.async.description: Style for async functions and the `async` and `await` keywords

*.readonly.description: Style to use for symbols that are read-only.

razorDirectiveColon.description: A colon between directive attribute parameters

razorDirective.description: A Razor directive such as 'code' or 'function'

markupCommentPunctuation.description: The begining or ending punctuation of a Markup comment.

markupOperator.description: Delimiter for Markup Attribute Key-Value pairs.

markupElement.description: The name of a Markup element.

markupAttribute.description: The name of a Markup attribute.

markupAttributeQuote.description: A token that represents an attribute quote in a Markup attribute.

markupAttributeValue.description: The value of a Markup attribute.

markupComment.description: The contents of a Markup comment.

excludedCode.description: A token that represents inactive code.

controlKeyword.description: A token that represents a control-flow keyword.

operatorOverloaded.description: A declaration or reference to an overloaded operator.

preprocessorText.description: Text associated with a preprocessor directive.

stringVerbatim.description: A token that represents a verbatim string.

stringEscapeCharacter.description: An escape character within a string.

recordClass.description: A definition or reference to a record class type.

delegate.description: A definition or reference to a delegate type.

recordStruct.description: A definition or reference to a record struct type.

field.description: A definition or reference to a field.

constant.description: A definition or reference to a constant.

extensionMethod.description: A definition or reference to an extension method

xmlDocCommentAttributeName.description: A token that represents an attribute in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentAttributeQuotes.description: A token that represents an attribute quote in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentAttributeValue.description: A token that represents an attribute value in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentCDataSection.description: A token that represents a CDATA section in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentComment.description: A token that represents a comment in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentDelimiter.description: A token that represents a delimeter in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentEntityReference.description: A token that represents reference to an entity in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentName.description: A token that represents a name in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentProcessingInstruction.description: A token that represents a processing instruction in an XML documentation comment

xmlDocCommentText.description: A token that represents text in an XML documentation comment

xmlLiteralAttributeName.description: A token that represents an attribute name in an XML literal

xmlLiteralAttributeQuotes.description: A token that represents an attribute quote in an XML literal

xmlLiteralAttributeValue.description: A token that represents an attribute value in an XML literal

xmlLiteralCDataSection.description: A token that represents a CDATA section in an XML literal

xmlLiteralComment.description: A token that represents a comment in an XML literal

xmlLiteralDelimiter.description: A token that represents a delimiter in an XML literal

xmlLiteralEmbeddedExpression.description: A token that represents an emebedded expression in an XML literal

xmlLiteralEntityReference.description: A token that represents a reference to an entity in an XML literal

xmlLiteralName.description: A token that represents a name in an XML literal

xmlLiteralProcessingInstruction.description: A token that represents a processing instruction in an XML literal

xmlLiteralText.description: A token that represents text in an XML literal

regexComment.description: A token that represents a comment in a regex string

regexCharacterClass.description: A token that represents a character class in a regex string

regexAnchor.description: A token that represents an anchor in a regex string

regexQuantifier.description: A token that represents a quantifier in a regex string

regexGrouping.description: A token that represents a group in a regex string

regexAlternation.description: A token that represents an alternation in a regex string

regexText.description: A token that represents text in a regex string

regexSelfEscapedCharacter.description: A token that represents a self escaped character in a regex string

regexOtherEscape.description: A token that represents an escape in a regex string

jsonComment.description: A token that represents a comment in a JSON string

jsonNumber.description: A token that represents a number in a JSON string

jsonString.description: A token that represents a string in a JSON string

jsonKeyword.description: A token that represents a keyword in a JSON string

jsonText.description: A token that represents text in a JSON string

jsonOperator.description: A token that represents an operator in a JSON string

jsonPunctuation.description: A token that represents punctuation in a JSON string

jsonArray.description: A token that represents an array in a JSON string

jsonObject.description: A token that represents an object in a JSON string

jsonPropertyName.description: A token that represents a property name in a JSON string

jsonConstructorName.description: A token that represents a constructor in a JSON string

builtinConstant.description: constants like True, False, None, or __debug__

memberOperatorOverload.description: Style for C++ overloaded operator member functions.

numberLiteral.description: Style for C++ user-defined literal numbers.

stringLiteral.description: Style for C++ user-defined literal strings.

attributeBracket.description: Style for attribute invocation brackets, that is the `#[` and `]` tokens

escapeSequence.description: Style for char or byte escapes in strings

formatSpecifier.description: Style for {} placeholders in format strings

invalidEscapeSequence.description: Style for invalid char or byte escapes in strings

macroBang.description: Style for the ! token of macro calls

selfTypeKeyword.description: Style for the self type keyword

unresolvedReference.description: Style for names which can not be resolved due to compilation errors

*.typeHintComment.description: inside a comment style type annotation

*.global.description: Style to use for symbols that are global.

*.local.description: Style to use for symbols that are local.

*.callable.description: Style for locals whose types implements one of the `Fn*` traits

*.consuming.description: Style for locals that are being consumed when use in a function call

*.controlFlow.description: Style for control-flow related tokens, this includes the `?` operator

*.crateRoot.description: Style for names resolving to a crate root

*.injected.description: Style for doc-string injected highlighting like rust source blocks in documentation

*.intraDocLink.description: Style for intra doc links in doc-strings

*.library.description: Style for items that are defined outside of the current crate

*.macro.description: Style for tokens inside of macro calls

*.mutable.description: Style for mutable locals and statics as well as functions taking `&mut self`

*.procMacro.description: Style for tokens inside of proc-macro calls

*.public.description: Style for items that are from the current crate and are `pub`

*.reference.description: Style for locals behind a reference and functions taking `self` by reference

*.unsafe.description: Style for unsafe operations, like unsafe function calls, as well as the `unsafe` token

style.description: Colors and styles for the token.

background.deprecationMessage: Token background colors are currently not supported.

fontStyle.description: Sets the all font styles of the rule: 'italic', 'bold', 'underline' or 'strikethrough' or a combination. All styles that are not listed are unset. The empty string unsets all styles.
fontStyle.patternErrorMessage: Font style must be 'italic', 'bold', 'underline' or 'strikethrough' or a combination. The empty string unsets all styles.

bold.description: Sets or unsets the font style to bold. Note, the presence of 'fontStyle' overrides this setting.

italic.description: Sets or unsets the font style to italic. Note, the presence of 'fontStyle' overrides this setting.

underline.description: Sets or unsets the font style to underline. Note, the presence of 'fontStyle' overrides this setting.

strikethrough.description: Sets or unsets the font style to strikethrough. Note, the presence of 'fontStyle' overrides this setting.
